title: Structured Curriculum for Training Simulation Technology Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical education and simulation equipment operation experience
context.additional_context: Customized training programs for in-service professionals to acquire practical simulation skills centered on real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform simulation equipment setup and basic operational procedures.
Learners can autonomously resolve over 80% of issues arising from simulation software/hardware.
Learners can design and evaluate customized educational scenarios in a VR-based simulation environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
